config.defaultValue: q.player.data.erb_defeated = 1; q.player.save_data(); q.run_command('tellraw ' + q.player.username + ' ["",{"text":"[' + q.npc.name + '] Damit, ' + q.player.username + ' [' + q.player.data.erb_defeated + ']"}]'); q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run function cobbletrainers:gyms/beat_erb')
